name: Dino Dart
description:
Google Play

Controls:
Mouse1: Jump

Dino Dart is a simple endless runner with multiple objectives including collecting eggs, saving babies and surviving extinction.

RUN as fast as you can!
AVOID the obstacles!
SURVIVE extinction.
Help Dart survive extinction while saving eggs and baby dinosaurs.

★ Collect dinosaur eggs
★ Save baby dinosaurs
★ Cute Pixel Art
★ Aim for a highest score
